scripts.install-all: npm i && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: cd ./frontend && npm run dev & cd ./backend && npm run dev
scripts.start: cd ./backend && pm2 start npm --name "footybee-backend" -- start && cd ../frontend && pm2 start npm --name "footybee-frontend" -- start
scripts.stop: pm2 stop footybee-backend && pm2 stop footybee-frontend && pm2 delete footybee-backend && pm2 delete footybee-frontend
scripts.restart: git pull && npm run stop && npm run start
